description:
Whenever you're stepping outside, this is the everyday staple you'll reach for time and again. First launched in the 1970s, the iconic Raven Jacket now comes in a lighter version for warmer places and season-spanning wear.G-1000 Air recycled polyester and organic cotton handles light rain and can be enhanced with Greenland Wax.Hood can be rolled-up and folded into the collar.2-way zipper with buttoned flap.Dual chest pockets and two large bellows pockets with extra openings from the sides.Interior zip pocket keeps tiny essentials close.Drawstring at waist and bottom hem let you get the fit just right.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content














                      Recycled content
name: Fjallraven Raven Lite Jacket - Men's
